They were some of the most brilliant scientific minds of the 20th century.
They pushed the limits of physics, consciousness, and energy itself…
and right after their breakthroughs — they mysteriously disappeared.

🔹 Itzhak Bentov – inventor, consciousness researcher, and pioneer in bioengineering.
His work attempted to explain the true structure of reality and human perception.
Right after presenting his theories to the world… everything changed.

🔹 Dr. Eugene Mallove – scientist and journalist who fought to defend alternative energy discoveries.
He believed a revolutionary form of clean energy already existed… and was being ignored.
His death shocked those who followed his work.
